comments.body:
Please avoid globals with dynamic constructor (basically if it can't be constexpr, it likely shouldn't be there).

Also a header is really not a good place for any of these variable if they aren't constexpr: this can easily lead to duplicate definitions.

Also favor LLVM data structure over the STL in general.
Changed kShapeCalcOperandMap and kPlaceRuleMap from global variable to PlaceShapeCalcOnHost's private variable.
